articles.title: Scientists at Antarctic Sanae IV base rocked by alleged assault - BBC.com
articles.description: A spokesperson for the South African government told the BBC there had been an assault at the station.
articles.content:
Mark Poynting and Justin Rowlatt
A group of scientists due to work together for months at a remote Antarctic research station has been rocked after a member of the team was accused of physical assau… [+4819 chars]
